# Boating Mallorca

> Free matching service for boat rentals, yacht charters, tours, excursions, mooring, maintenance, and events in Mallorca, Spain.

## About

Boating Mallorca (boatingmallorca.ai) is a free lead-matching service based in Palma de Mallorca, Spain. Users submit their preferences (boat type, location, budget, dates, group size) and receive 3 personalized options from vetted local providers within 24 hours via email or WhatsApp. The service is completely free for users.

## Services

- **Boat Rentals & Charters** (/rentals-charters): Motorboats, catamarans, speed boats, sailing yachts, fishing boats. Bareboat, skippered, and crewed charters. Prices from 100 EUR/day (small motorboat) to 10,000+ EUR/week (crewed superyacht).
- **Tours & Excursions** (/tours-excursions): Sunset cruises, day trips, fishing charters, SUP/kayak tours, island excursions. Prices from 35 EUR/person (SUP tour) to 1,500 EUR/boat (private charter).
- **Mooring & Maintenance** (/mooring-maintenance): Marina berths, boat storage, winterizing, haul-out, antifouling, engine repairs.
- **Events & Clubs** (/events-clubs): Boat parties, regattas (Copa del Rey, PalmaVela), yacht clubs, water sports.
- **Buy a Yacht** (/buy-yacht): New and pre-owned yacht purchasing guidance and broker matching.
- **Sell a Yacht** (/sell-yacht): Yacht listing, valuation, and broker matching for sellers.
- **Crew & Jobs** (/crew-jobs): Maritime crew positions and job listings in Mallorca.
- **RIB Club** (/rib-club): Premium RIB boating experiences and membership.

## Explore Mallorca

### Destinations & Anchorages (/explore/destinations)
10 detailed boating destination guides covering the full island:
- Palma de Mallorca: Main charter hub with 5 major marinas and largest fleet selection.
- Alcudia Bay: Sheltered waters ideal for families, beginners, and water sports.
- Port de Pollenca: Premier sailing location with consistent thermal winds and mountain views.
- Andratx & Dragonera Island: Dramatic west coast with Sa Dragonera natural park.
- Cala d'Or & Southeast Coast: Turquoise coves perfect for cove-hopping and snorkeling.
- Soller & Northwest Coast: UNESCO Tramuntana cliffs, Sa Calobra, advanced sailing territory.
- Cabrera Archipelago National Park: Protected marine park with Blue Grotto, permits required.
- Cala Ratjada & Capdepera: Fishing port with excellent deep-sea fishing and east coast coves.
- Magaluf & Calvia Coast: Party boats, group catamaran tours, Portals Vells caves.
- Hidden Coves of Mallorca: Secret anchorages only accessible by boat.

### Marinas & Ports (/explore/marinas)
10 marina guides with berth counts, max lengths, facilities, and pricing:
- Port Adriano: Philippe Starck-designed, 439 berths, up to 80m, superyacht focus.
- Marina Port de Mallorca: Central Palma, 275 berths, customs clearance.
- Real Club Nautico de Palma: 1,025 berths, Copa del Rey host, sailing school.
- Puerto Portals: 670 berths, luxury lifestyle marina, designer boutiques.
- Club de Mar: 625 berths, up to 90m, largest Balearic boatyard (300-ton lift).
- Marina de Alcudia: 750 berths, family-friendly, affordable, northern Mallorca.
- Port de Pollenca Marina: 375 berths, premier sailing community.
- Portocolom Harbor: 450 berths, largest natural harbor, traditional fishing port.
- Mallorca Marina Comparison: Side-by-side comparison of all major marinas.
- Superyacht Berths: Premium berths for vessels 30m+ across Palma marinas.

### Charter Companies (/directory/charter-companies)
- Best Charter Companies: Overview of 100+ operators, fleet types, how to choose.

- Luxury Crewed Charters: Full-service with captain, chef, stewardess, 10,000-200,000+ EUR/week.

### Boat Brands & Builders (/directory/brands)
- Sunseeker Yachts in Mallorca: British luxury motor yachts, 48-131ft.
- Beneteau Boats Mallorca: Oceanis sailing yachts, Gran Turismo motorboats.
- Lagoon Catamarans Mallorca: World's leading catamaran brand, 40-77ft.
- Electric & Hybrid Boats: Zero-emission boating, silent running, rental availability.

### Marine Services (/directory/marine-services)
- Boat Repair Yards: STP Palma (300-ton lift), Club de Mar boatyard, labor rates 45-85 EUR/hr.
- Marine Surveyors: Pre-purchase, insurance, and damage surveys, 1,500-5,000 EUR.
- Sailing Schools & Licenses: ICC, RYA Day Skipper, Yachtmaster courses, 400-4,000 EUR.
- Yacht Transport & Shipping: Delivery crew, road transport, semi-submersible options.
- Marine Insurance: Third-party (mandatory), comprehensive, premiums 1-3% of vessel value.

### Yacht Clubs & Associations (/directory/yacht-clubs)
- Yacht Clubs of Mallorca: 20+ clubs, membership 300-2,000 EUR/year.
- Junior Sailing & Youth Programs: Children's courses from age 6, 200-500 EUR/week.

Palma de Mallorca, Alcudia, Port de Pollenca, Cala Ratjada, Cala d'Or, Andratx, Port Adriano, Soller, Magaluf, Calvia, Portocolom, Cabrera, Santa Ponsa, Puerto Portals.

## Pricing Summary

- Small motorboat rental (no license): 100-400 EUR/day
- Speed boat / catamaran rental: 200-1,500 EUR/day
- Bareboat yacht charter: 1,500-6,000 EUR/week
- Skippered yacht charter: 2,500-8,000 EUR/week
- Crewed yacht charter: 10,000-200,000+ EUR/week
- Sunset cruise (shared): 55-85 EUR/person
- Fishing charter (half day): 400-600 EUR/boat
- SUP/kayak tour: 35-60 EUR/person
- Marina berth: 12-400+ EUR/day (size and location dependent)
